author: Mark Kaufman
title: The coronavirus test isn't as scary as it looks
description: Pictures and illustrations of a coronavirus test might look unnerving. But medical experts emphasize the procedure — which is a common test for respiratory infections — is absolutely normal. Though testing is still limited in places, if you have symptoms of C…
content:
